verbose_text: In addition, relatively low level of CD8 + response compared with those in natural infection with a non lethal strain [XREF_BIBR], and a low level of CD4 + T response in these ROP17 DNA immunized mice might be another reason for the low level of protection against acute T. gondii infection in the present study because only the synergy between CD8 + and CD4 + T cells can provide efficient protection against T. gondii [XREF_BIBR].
